objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1a1a1a'/><g><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L1080 1080 L0 1080 Z' fill='#1a1a1a' fill-opacity='0.7'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='none' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='none' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' fill='none' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='1'/></g><path d='M0 700 C 180 650, 360 675, 540 650 S 720 600, 900 625 L 1080 650 L 1080 1080 L 0 1080 Z' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05'/><g transform='translate(20, 980)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='8' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='8' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='80' cy='0' r='8' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.3'/></g><g transform='translate(920, 80)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='8' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='8' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.3'/><circle cx='80' cy='0' r='8' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.3'/></g><path d='M 200,200 L 260,200 L 230,140 Z' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1' transform='rotate(30, 230, 170)'/><path d='M 840,200 L 900,200 L 870,140 Z' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1' transform='rotate(-30, 870, 170)'/><path d='M 200,840 L 260,840 L 230,900 Z' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1' transform='rotate(-30, 230, 870)'/><path d='M 840,840 L 900,840 L 870,900 Z' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.1' transform='rotate(30, 870, 870)'/><defs><radialGradient id='grad1' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#2d2d2d'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#121212'/></radialGradient></defs></svg>

objects.text: Premium Canvas • Iconic Design • Versatile Style

product_details.name: Converse Ultimate Style Pack - Classic Backpack & Sneaker Combo
product_details.description:
• Sleek black Converse backpack with iconic star chevron logo
• Classic high-top Chuck Taylor All-Star sneaker in timeless black canvas
• Sporty white and grey low-top sneakers for versatile style
• Durable backpack with spacious main compartment and front zip pocket
• Signature white rubber toe cap and sole on high-top sneakers
• Comfortable cushioned insoles in both shoe styles
• Premium quality canvas material for long-lasting wear
• Authentic Converse branding and design elements
• Perfect combination for school, sports, or casual everyday use
• Versatile black and white color scheme matches any outfit

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern and sporty promotional layout centered around a premium backpack and sneaker combo. At the top, a large bold title (text ID: "heading") captures attention, paired with a sleek subheading (text ID: "subheading") just below it. A brief descriptor (text ID: "tagline") supports the message with concise product context. The central focus is a product image (image ID: "product_image") featuring stylish footwear and a branded backpack. Supporting benefits are listed beneath the image (text ID: "description"). A bold price highlight (text ID: "price") emphasizes value, complemented by a contrasting call-to-action button (IDs: "cta_background" and "cta") encouraging immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1a1a1a`
- Dark Gray: `#2d2d2d`
- Light Gray: `#cccccc`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image features a minimalistic yet bold color palette primarily composed of black, white, grey, and light beige. The black backpack and high-top sneaker establish a strong base (#000000), contrasted by the crisp white Converse branding and shoelaces (#FFFFFF). Grey accents on the low-top sneakers (#A9A9A9) blend smoothly with white to create soft transitions, adding depth. Beige tones in the midsole and outsole of the high-top shoes (#EAE6DA) complement the black and white without overpowering. These neutral tones are both modern and versatile, making them ideal for an advertisement banner with a clean, urban aesthetic.
